title: Simba's Mantra Website
description: UI for simba's personal mantras with voting and leaderboard enabled using Firebase as a database

title: Alignment Game
description: The perfect way to find out how your friends match up on the classic Dungeons & Dragons alignment scale, uses Firebase

title: Quizzical
description: Take a quiz from a random set of 5 questions from the quiz API

title: Tenzies
description: Roll the dice and try to get 10 of a kind, freezing dice between rounds
